interests.name: Jordan River Temple
interests.address: 10200 S Temple Dr, South Jordan, UT 84095
interests.descript: Come worship the Lord in this temple local to West and South Jordan. Dedicated on November 16, 1981.

interests.name: Oquirrh Mountain Temple
interests.descript: Come worship the Lord in this second temple where in West and South Jordan. Dedicated on August 21, 2009.

interests.name: Gardner Village
interests.descript: Come check out the shopping center that is Gardner Village. Here there are many events and things going on for the whole family.

interests.name: Jordan Landing
interests.address: 3751 W Center Park Dr, West Jordan, UT 84084
interests.descript: Here at the Jordan Landing Shoping District you can check out many different shops, and food spots that all are here. A great place for the family.

interests.name: Viridian Events Center
interests.descript: Not only is the Viridian a library but all sorts of events are hosted there. One very popular event that goes on here among teens and young adults is ToshoCon.

interests.name: Veterans Memorial Park
interests.descript: Here you can come and show some respect for those who have fought for our country. This is a perfect sport for Veterans Day, and Memorial Day.

interests.name: Wild West Jordan Playground
interests.address: 8000 S Redwood Rd, West Jordan, UT 84088
interests.descript: Here is a perfect spot for your kids to play and have fun. There are many things from a playground, to tennis courts, basketball courts, and even volleyball courts.

interests.name: Sierra Newbold Memorial Playground
interests.address: 5900 New Bingham Hwy, West Jordan, UT 84081
interests.descript: Another park with a playground, splashpad, pickleball courts, and pavilions and tables. A great place for some summer fun with your kids and the whole family.
